name: Veil of Maya
description: '''Veil of Maya''' is an American [[metalcore]] band formed in [[Chicago]], [[Illinois]] in 2004. It consists of guitarist Marc Okubo, drummer Sam Applebaum, and bassist Danny Hauser. They are signed to [[Sumerian Records]] and have released seven studio albums, with their most recent, ''[[Mother (Veil of Maya album)|Mother]]'', being released in 2023.
